manual_override_enable.name: Enable manual override
manual_override_enable.description: Enable manual override for these lights. Layered Lighting won't touch them until the timeout runs out.

dimming_down.name: Start dimming
dimming_down.description: Start dimming this light. Used when the physical button is pressed down.

dimming_up.name: Stop dimming
dimming_up.description: Stop dimming this light. Used when the physical button is released.

dimming_toggle.name: Toggle light
dimming_toggle.description: Turn on / off the light. Exclusive with `Start / stop dimming`. Used for switches.

layer_enable.name: Enable light layer
layer_enable.description: Enable the effects of a light layer.

layer_disable.name: Disable light layer
layer_disable.description: Disable the effects of a light layer. Other light layers will take over.

layer_disable_all.name: Disable all light layer
layer_disable_all.description: Disable all light layers. Will result in all lights turning off.

update_internal_state.name: Update internal state (advanced)
update_internal_state.description: When this integration starts, it caches the state for all lights. Each scene is activated which results in flickering. If any scene changes, you must call this. Maybe do it once per day.

sun_power.name: Set lights based on intensity of sun (only to be used in the Layered Lighting config)

absolute.name: Normalize value
absolute.description: Normalize value so midnight is 100% and midday -100% (dusk & dawn becomes 0%)

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Offset to the brightness. 0.3 => 30% brighter all the time

factor.name: Factor
factor.description: Multiplicative factor to the brightness. Applied before the offset.
